name: HOT MESS (itch) (clonethirteen)
description:
This game was made for Mini-Jam #74. The theme for the jam was "Chaos"  and it had a limitation of only using a certain set of keys on a keyboard. For the theme I decided on a pseudo controlled character on a parkour run through the bowels of hell. With the limited keys it just created more chaos as the keys are not laid out in a convenient way to make the game easily playable.

Controls - Character will always more right.

  • A - will allow you to glide while in air.
  • X - run faster.
  • B - shoot fireballs.
  • Spacebar - jump.

A message from the creator  - As with all my projects there are plans to improve and add more content. Please leave a comment or suggestion.  I don't think there are any bugs at this time, but play-testing time was limited. Please let me know if you find one.
